title: XP boost?
body: I started a new account in hopes of getting it to lvl 30 but starting the game fresh i remembered that when i started riot sent an email and you had to confirm it to get a free xp / ip boost, just curious if that still exist today because im really confused. Thanks.

replies.body: You get a 4 win IP boost (no xp, sorry) for verifying your email address.  Head over [**here**](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect) to verify!
